column3: “Great strain, I felt relaxed and stress free. I got lost in whatever activity I was doing.”
“Very nice hybrid. Tastes piney and is very good for pain relief. Hard to find but definitely pick it up if you can!”
“I got it in pho-wax made by nomad extracts. Smelled like mothballs and tasted like sushi with wasabi. Not in a good way lol but the high was pleasant, gentle and relaxing”
“It has a very distinct sweet smell. Definitely an uplifting high. This strain would go hand in hand with art (drawing or music wise). Worth trying”
“Aspen is a mild mix of an uplifting high and a very relaxed high. I never found myself being overly active while on aspen but I was never falling asleep tired off the high.”
